commands.name: az synapse link-connection create
examples:
az synapse link-connection create --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconnectionname \
  --file @"path/definition.json"

commands.name: az synapse link-connection delete
examples:
az synapse link-connection delete --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconnectionname

commands.name: az synapse link-connection edit-link-tables
commands.summary: Edit tables for a link connection.
examples:
az synapse link-connection edit-link-tables --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name linkconnectionname \
  --file @path/edittablerequestfile.json

commands.name: az synapse link-connection get-link-tables-status
commands.summary: Query the link table status of a link connection.
examples:
az synapse link-connection get-link-tables-status --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name linkconnectionname \
  --max-segment-count 50 \
  --continuation-token token

commands.name: az synapse link-connection get-status
commands.summary: Check a link connection status after start/stop a link connection.
examples:
az synapse link-connection get-status --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconnectionname

commands.name: az synapse link-connection list
commands.summary: List link connections in a synapse workspace.

commands.name: az synapse link-connection list-link-tables
commands.summary: List the link tables of a link connection.
examples:
az synapse link-connection list-link-tables --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name linkconnectionname \

commands.name: az synapse link-connection show
examples:
az synapse link-connection show --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconectionname

commands.name: az synapse link-connection start
examples:
az synapse link-connection start --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconnectionname

commands.name: az synapse link-connection stop
examples:
az synapse link-connection stop --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconnectionname

commands.name: az synapse link-connection update
examples:
az synapse link-connection update --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name testlinkconnectionname \
  --file @"path/definition.json"

commands.name: az synapse link-connection update-landing-zone-credential
commands.summary: Update landing zone credetial of a link connection.
examples:
az synapse link-connection update-landing-zone-credential --workspace-name testsynapseworkspace \
  --name linkconnectionname \
  --sas-token sastoken
